comments.body: 48 hours to go... Fam, just for info. I have put this beautiful collectible in the forum for the price i paid for it.This is not a "Casio with a B" watch. It's a high quality Automatic watch with lifetime warranty from superfriendly enthusiasts to other die hard Bitcoiners.I'm glad to share this here and make somebody happy...stay safe all together
